title: You guys took the health, the HP regen, and the aura from Locket.
body: Did you really have to take the CDR from it too?

replies.body:
"theres too much free cdr in the game"

"OMG RIOT WHY DID YOU REMOVE CDR FROM MY ITEM"

There's no pleasing the boards.

heal and shield supports had way to much CDR, so they removed CDR from locket. Now tanky supports have a problem to get 40%CDR. They can´t go {{item:2303}} , they have to get {{item:3401}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3060}}  (maybe on some champs in some situations {{item:3107}} ) every single game.
I mean Redemption is a pretty busted item so I don't see how it is a situational item even (pretty much better than FH in every conceivable way).

I mean on a tank-support its not that great, because it has no armor or mr just health and the shield/healpower is not that great on many tank-supps, the active is very strong, but doesn´t help you that much at tanking.
Its propably better than I thought but still, I feel like there are options missing (maybe something with mr and CDR?).

> [{quoted}](name=NoganksOnlyFarm ,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HjEuqUhu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-16T09:05:05.026+0000)
>
> "theres too much free cdr in the game"
> 
> "OMG RIOT WHY DID YOU REMOVE CDR FROM MY ITEM"
> 
> There's no pleasing the boards.

Sorry to burn down your strawman, but I want you to find a single post where I ever said this.

There's been lots of threads both here and Reddit saying that CDR is much too common and that Riot should remove it from some items. The person you replied to never said that YOU complained there was too much CDR, just that the boards in general have.

Players pretty much never never complained about supports having too much CDR.  

Any complaints about the prevalence of CDR were generally directed towards ADCs and mages.

Pure supports used to have more CDR than every other stat. So "never" is a bit strong.
Then again, Supports also used to have more unspendable gold than every other lane combined thanks to wards. (>_>)

Boots of Speed + Philosopher's Stone + Kage's Luck Pick + Green Wards + Pink Wards

{{champion:40}} Yay, full build.
If you ever say you heard too much tank supp cdr, you're a dirty liar.

> [{quoted}](name=NoganksOnlyFarm ,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HjEuqUhu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-16T09:05:05.026+0000)
>
> "theres too much free cdr in the game" "OMG RIOT WHY DID YOU REMOVE CDR FROM MY ITEM" There's no pleasing the boards.

Except that was almost always in reference to items like {{item:3078}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3071}} etc.

I don't think I ever saw anyone say "Too much CDR,therefore nerf Locket" and I check the boards on a very regular basis. Your argument is complete trash.

I like the new locket.  It scales better with itself now.  I will miss the aura though, since it saved my teammates from so many mage combos.
There does need to be more cdr itemization for tank supports though.
New Locket is garbo.

It's actually really, really good.  Most high elo games have at least 2 lockets per game, sometimes 2 per team.  The active shield is just huge.  Also, it does give 60 MR now (as well as 30 armor), while being fairly cheap.

> [{quoted}](name=RisenDarkKnight,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HjEuqUhu,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:50:47.150+0000)
>
> It's actually really, really good.  Most high elo games have at least 2 lockets per game, sometimes 2 per team.

That's complete nonsense.

Try to peddle those lies to someone that doesn't regularly play against masters and other diamonds.

> [{quoted}](name=Dominick Destine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HjEuqUhu,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T22:46:35.717+0000)
>
> That's complete nonsense.
> 
> Try to peddle those lies to someone that doesn't regularly play against masters and other diamonds.


I can't verify his claim, but it IS objectively a popular support item. Going by Probuild stats, it's present in 50-70% of every tank supports' build on the pro circuit.

Masters? Lulz you are dia 5 :D 
Your last twenty games weren't even against diamonds maybe one or two.

> [{quoted}](name=GayFluffyUnicorn,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HjEuqUhu,comment-id=0006000000000001,timestamp=2016-11-17T14:48:51.391+0000)
>
> Masters? Lulz you are dia 5 :D 
> Your last twenty games weren't even against diamonds maybe one or two.

I was Diamond 5 in S6.

S7  I am currently Plat 3. Reading comprehension is not a crime.

I agree {{item:3107}}  being added and the CDR being removed kinda invalidated getting locket (Unless your playing MAXIMUM SHIELD NAUTILUS, which is so fking troll, but so fun at the same time,{{item:3107}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3401}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3158}} )

It's funny because it's still busted as fuck rn
But yeah I hope they add cdr back onto it after nerfing it's ridiculous active

Is it though? I have not seen a support build it once this season and i myself wont build it because {{item:3107}} is honestly better then it in every way.

{{item:3190}}  is honestly more suited for tanks now then it is supports. And i am seeing toplane tanks build it now.

> [{quoted}](name=LuluxAnnieYuri,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HjEuqUhu,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T07:53:29.429+0000)
>
> Is it though? I have not seen a support build it once this season and i myself wont build it because {{item:3107}} is honestly better then it in every way.
> 
> {{item:3190}}  is honestly more suited for tanks now then it is supports. And i am seeing toplane tanks build it now.

why not both?
when its better for tanksupps, it should give CDR
I thought it has 400 HP?
Why not both?
Stop takin ma auras rito!!!

Take a look at other tank itemization. They've removed CDR, HP, Regen, and gutted utility on all of them as well. 

Riot hates it when mages/adcs can't 1v1 anything in the game.

They removed the superfluous CDR on the item that usually ended up being wasted and made the shield stronger in exchange, and you're complaining. You literally traded worthless stats for useful stats and you're unhappy about it.
CDR is not a worthless stat on a tank-support
It often ends up being worthless since your builds often end up having more than 40% CDR.
tell me how to get easy 40%CDR on a tank-support

> [{quoted}](name=Silverjust,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HjEuqUhu,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-17T18:46:34.078+0000)
>
> tell me how to get easy 40%CDR on a tank-support

{{item:3110}} {{item:3401}} {{item:3107}}

so I should get {{item:3110}} every single game? And {{item:3107}} is not that great on many tank-supports. {{item:3060}} is situational. If I get Frozen Hart every single game maybe, but there should be more options. There are only two buildpaths that make sense for tanksupporter to get 40%CDR, what if they dont fit on a champion and/or game?
feels like they prepare it for deletion
